author: marrs
msg: FELIX-50 Rearranged the handling of dependency changes, resulting service state changes and the resulting (de)activation of the service.
Introduced a new State object (which is a complete snapshot of the state).
Added a serial executor that serially executes tasks in a queue (without creating a new thread(pool)).
Note: the code is still being tested, and contains debug statements, so use it with care!

author: mamta
msg: Unary arithmetic operators "+","-","SQRT", "ABS/ABSVAL" only take numeric parameters and hence no need to worry about collation information

author: dims
msg: My friends it's *NOT* a ClassWriter it writes files of all kinds :) am making this change as i don't want it frozen after 1.3 and it's used everywhere...
